# fishphylo

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of fishphylo is to import sequence data from GenBank and from Fasta files et construct phylogenetic trees

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jurenoult/fishphylo")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(fishphylo)
## basic example code
fishphylo::cb_taxa_gene(c("Gobius","Pomatoschistus"),"COI")
```
